wikipedia_page.main: Dick Turner  (born 1866) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 2 matches. He played his first match on 7 February 1891 against Ireland and his last match on 7 March 1891 against England. At club level, he played for Wrexham.

response: * Dick Turner (1932–2008), Australian rugby league footballer, coach and administrator
*Dick Turner (footballer) (1866–after 1891), Wrexham A.F.C. and Wales international footballer
